properties.text: Plus - "Good to have, but not must"

Why use Feature-based SLAM?

- Feature-based methods are well-established 
- Keypoints (i.e. visual features) are 'robust'

Why use Direct SLAM?

- Feature-based SLAM does not work on feature-less environments
- Too much time + resource used to extract features
- Mapping is sparse and slow (only done in keyframes)
Understanding the Limitations of CNN-based Absolute Camera Pose Regression - Sattler 2019
From Coarse to Fine: Robust Hierarchical Localization at Large Scale - Sarlin 2018
